trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Garberville
There were no other sightings in Garberville on or around September 30th 2000
Summary: multiple dancing white lights viewed in sky
divs: sighting detailsabout 10pm i was preparing to sleep in my car on a friend's property on elk ridge, s. humboldt county, about 3 miles from briceland. i just filed a report on a sighting i had in the late 70s. this sighting took place about 2 miles from the other one more than 20 years later. i had a nissan sentra that you could fold the back seat down and i had made that into a bed with foam pads (i'm small). i had just settled down, head to back of car, hatch up, was looking at sky through hatch window, looking generally east, when i noticed maybe six to ten white pts of light moving very strangely in relationship to each other. they were already there when i noticed them, so i don't know how long they had been there. i was extremely tired, was at that time a reporter and had just put in a 10 hour day getting the paper out. also, now know i was very ill with undiagnosed lyme disease. i know it sounds strange, but because of those things i could not stay awake and i went to sleep watching them. i first noticed the objects because of their number and the strange movement. i don't know how to describe it, i could make the motion with my hands for you if you were here. they were dancing with each other. in twos, but they'd change partners every so often. it was sort of like a swarm of gnats, but much more mechanical and regular. it was sort of like a couple of kids at camp with flashlights, playing tag with their lights on a wall, but again much more rhythmic and regular. very rhythmic. if you imagine two planets orbiting an unseen sun in same orbit, equidistant from each other, but they both reverse direction at each halfway point, that's as close as i can get to it. it was very hypnotic, as well, which might also explain how i could possible fall asleep watching them. my first thought when i saw them was i was seeing insects very close to me, illuminated by the car's interior light. but then i turned the light off and saw that they were distant, over the hill line about 1\2 mile away. the hill line 1\2 mile away, the lights were clearly way up in the sky. i lost sight of the objects when i went to sleep. when i woke up next day, no sign of anything unusual.
